revised_title: Observations of Magnetic Needle Declination and Tides
tldr: D. B. reports on the present declination of the magnetic needle and tides, sharing observations made by Capt. Samuel Sturmy in Rownham-Meadowes. The observations reveal a variation increase of about 6 minutes westerly. D. B. anticipates further, more precise measurements and information on tides in the future.
